products.name: Ashton Jacket
products.brandedName: Paisley & Gray Ashton Jacket
products.description: Introducing the Paisley & Gray Ashton Jacket, a standout piece from the quirky and chic menswear brand Paisley & Gray. This vibrant blue shark jacket features a distinctive peak lapel, left breast pocket, three front pockets, printed pocket square, button cuffs, and side vents for added style and comfort. Measuring approximately 29.5 inches from shoulder to hem, this jacket is designed to fit impeccably. The model is 6'2.5 and is wearing a size 40R, but please note that measurements may vary slightly by size. With a two-button front closure and made from a luxurious blend of 80% polyester, 18% rayon, and 2% spandex, this jacket is both stylish and comfortable. Make a statement with the Paisley & Gray Ashton Jacket, a must-have addition to any modern man's wardrobe. Dry clean only. Imported.

products.name: Nike Men's Metcon 9 AMP Workout Shoes in Grey, Size: 6 | DZ2616-008
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Metcon 9 AMP Workout Shoes in Grey, Size: 6 | DZ2616-008
products.unbrandedName: Men's Metcon 9 AMP Workout Shoes in Grey, Size: 6 | DZ2616-008
products.description: Whatever your "why" is for working out, the Metcon 9 makes it all worth it. We improved on the 8 with a larger Hyperlift plate and added rubber rope wrap. Sworn by some of the greatest athletes in the world, intended for lifters, cross trainers, go-getters and it's still the gold standard that delivers day after day. Tougher and Stronger:We made the Hyperlift plate in the heel even bigger for stability when getting after tough workouts like split squats, dead lifts and other lower-body exercises. The plate helps force weight down and out while adding rigidity in the heel. That firmness helps you feel grounded and supported, specifically under heavier loads. Secure Feel:The lace lock system attaches to the shoe tongue, so you don't have to worry about latching it to any fabric. It helps keep your laces in place, so once you tie up, you can focus solely on your workout. Go to the Top:We extended the rubber wrap on the side for durability and support, so that you can scale any kind of rope climb with the same repeated velocity without worrying about wear and tear. It stretches from the midsole to the upper and adds some support in the upper for multidirectional movements. Durable and Cool:Lightweight, breathable mesh helps keep your foot cool yet sports the kind of durability that can withstand scrapes, slashes and quick-drag movements. Feel the Foam:Dual-density midsole—firm foam on the outside, soft foam on the inside—provides responsive cushioning for lasting comfort for continuous cardio and movements. More Benefits:Full rubber outsole provides durable traction for dynamic movements like cleans and walking lunges. Breathable textile has a haptic print, which creates a 3-D effect that adds durability and texture, helping make it easier to keep your shoes clean. Also, it sports flexible, durable support in the toe area, so that when your toes splay when lifting heavy weights, it won't feel restrictive. Style: DZ2616; Color: Dark Stucco/Flat Pewter/Phantom/Light Bone; Size: 6; Gender: Male; Age Group: Adult | Nike Metcon 9 AMP Men's Workout Shoes in Grey, Size: 6 | DZ2616-008

products.unbrandedName: Men's Los Angeles Dodgers MLB Rally Drive Jacket
products.description: Size & Fit: Standard fit is athletic and relaxed. Product Features: Snap-button closure across the front for versatile layering and styling options. Lightweight yet durable polyester satin twill material with a polished sheen for comfortable protection and style. Racing-inspired design with Los Angeles Dodgers visuals across the front and back. Screen-printed team wordmark across the front with a chenille applique applique logo at the right chest. Team patches on the sleeves add to the all-out look. Contrast trim on the hem and sleeve cuffs add a sporty look and streamline the fit. Front hand pockets offer easy-access storage space while on the go. 100% polyester satin twill. Machine wash. The New Era Los Angeles Dodgers MLB Rally Drive Jacket is imported. Take your wardrobe and team spirit to a new level with the Men's New Era Los Angeles Dodgers MLB Rally Drive Jacket. Influenced by retro racing gear and varsity jackets, this satin jacket takes a not-so-subtle approach to showcasing your allegiance with an assortment of Dodgers patches and graphics on the front, back, and sleeves for a gem in your fanwear rotation.

products.name: Cole Haan Men's Triboro Leather Rucksack Backpack Navy/Tan
products.brandedName: Cole Haan Men's Triboro Leather Rucksack Backpack Navy/Tan
products.unbrandedName: Men's Triboro Leather Rucksack Backpack Navy/Tan
products.description: Ditch the ordinary backpack and rediscover the cool convenience of the Triboro Rucksack. This premium leather bag blends classic design with modern functionality, making it your perfect companion for city adventures or your daily commute. Stay organized on the go with easy-access exterior pockets for your water bottle and other essentials. The roomy main compartment features a padded, suspended laptop sleeve to keep your tech safe, while interior pockets and an elastic pen holder keep everything else in its place. Traveling? Utilize the trolley pass through for seamless connections, and when you're not using it, the included dust bag keeps your backpack protected. Crafted from top-quality leather, the Triboro Rucksack is built to last and become your go-to bag. Dimensions: 16"L x 6.25"W x 16.5"H. Handle Drop: 2".

products.unbrandedName: Relaxed Cotton Self Belted Trouser in White
products.description: These chic trousers are a spin on our Wythe Trouser: casual but refined, in a modern oversized but tailored fit. A natural waist and double reverse pleats (which face out, away from the fly) lead to a relaxed fit through the legs for a vintage-inspired look. At the waist is a removable belt in the same chic, midweight cotton the rest of the pant is cut from, which has a vintage, military feel. Another special tailoring detail we love: the split back at the waist. Hot days are all about finding easy pieces that make a quick impact, and these pants do just that: style them simply with a tucked-in tank, or double down on volume with a slouchy top. 100% cotton; Relaxed Fit; Self-Fabric Removable Belt; Belt Loops; Zip Fly, Tab Closure; Double Reverse Pleats; Hand and Back Pockets; Full Stovevpipe Leg; 18.5 Leg Opening; Made in China; Dry clean or machine wash cold, gentle cycle, with like colors. Shawl collar Long sleeves Button-front closure 100% cotton Machine washable Imported SIZE & FIT About 26.75" from shoulder to hem Model measurements: 6'2" tall, 40" chest Model is wearing a US size Medium ABOUT THE BRAND Synonymous with Americana style since 1967, Ralph Lauren started with one item-the necktie-under the name Polo. The house has since stood for the epitome of refined dressing for men. From collegiate sweaters and polos to evening-ready suiting and tailored coats, there's a timeless piece for every occasion.
